item.title: Distinguishing Between Multiple UIActionSheets with Swift
item.description: The challenge when dealing with the presentation and handling of more than one UIActionSheet in a single View Controller is made clear by asking, “How am I going to tell which action sheet I’m dealing with so that I can handle the user’s choice appropriately?” Presumably, the user’s interaction with one of the action sheets will be different than the other(s), so you’ll need to think through how to distinguish between them, in order to respond to that interaction appropriately.
